org.springframework.integration.mail.dsl

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.mail.dsl.Mail

  • public final class Mail
extends Object
    The factory for Spring Integration Mail components.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Gary Russell, Artem Bilan
